i1.name: King's Tribute
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy dies near '''Trundle''', he {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{passive progression/deprecated version|key=%|2 to 7}} of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Whenever an enemy dies near Trundle, he heals for Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version key=% 2 to 7 of their maximum health.
i1.notes: * ''King's Tribute'' does not trigger when an enemy structure is destroyed.

q1.name: Chomp
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 75% for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
After biting his target, '''Trundle''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} for 5 seconds and reduces his target's {{as|attack damage}} by half that amount for the same duration.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle's next basic attack becomes unstoppable, deals bonus physical damage and slows the target by 75% for 0.1 seconds.After biting his target, Trundle gains bonus attack damage for 5 seconds and reduces his target's attack damage by half that amount for the same duration.Chomp resets Trundle's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* ''Chomp'' will still incur the {{sti|{{as|attack damage}}}} increase for '''Trundle''' even if the attack is {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}}, missed while he is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, or it is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the attack damage reduction and {{tip|slow}}.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % AD)

w1.name: Frozen Domain
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' coats the target area in ice for 8 seconds. While inside, he gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, and 25% increased {{tip|healing}} from all sources.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle coats the target area in ice for 8 seconds. While inside, he gains bonus attack speed, bonus movement speed, and 25% increased healing from all sources.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 100}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 52}}%}}

e1.name: Pillar of Ice
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all units directly over it 225 units on cast, acting as impassable terrain for the duration and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies around it.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, knocking back all units directly over it 225 units on cast, acting as impassable terrain for the duration and slowing enemies around it.
e1.notes:
* ''Pillar of Ice'' displaces allied units away from the area but does not render them {{tip|airborne}}.
** Allied {{tip|channel|channels}} (e.g. {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}) will be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} however.
* ''Pillar of Ice'' cannot be placed inside impassable terrain. Attempting to do so will cause the pillar to spawn in the nearest available spot of accessible terrain.
* ''Pillar Of Ice'' triggers effects such as drawing turret aggro, {{ri|Sudden Impact}} and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} by dealing 0 {{tip|proc damage|proc}} {{tip|true damage}}.

r1.name: Subjugate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' starts draining the life force out of the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|heal|healing}} for a percentage of {{as|their '''maximum''' health}}, dealing the same amount as {{as|magic damage}}, stealing 40% of their {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}}, and increasing in [[size]] by 18% as well as reducing his target's [[size]] by {{fd|9.9}}%. Half of the '''total''' damage and stealing is applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has {{tip|death|died}}.
The {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Trundle starts draining the life force out of the target enemy champion, healing for a percentage of their maximum health, dealing the same amount as magic damage, stealing 40% of their armor and magic resistance, and increasing in size by 18% as well as reducing his target's size by 9.9%. Half of the total damage and stealing is applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has died.The armor and magic resistance will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20 to 35}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Initial Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20/2 to 35/2}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Magic Damage Per Second|{{as|{{ap|20/8 to 35/8}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}}}
r1.notes:
* The '''total''' value of armor, magic resist and damage that will be dealt is determined ''at the point of cast''. Temporary boosts and/or reductions in resistances or health (e.g. {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}}, {{ri|Aftershock}}, {{ii|Black Cleaver}}) will affect those values if they are active before cast, but will not affect those values if they come into effect afterwards.
* '''Trundle''' gains {{fd|11.7}} extra [[range]] on his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} (relative to his and enemy center) as a consequence of his increased [[size]].
** So do his enemies.
** He gains {{fd|3.78}} to {{fd|6.255}} range against the target he ''subjugated'', depending on their base size, and so does the target against him.
* '''Trundle''' will lose the buff if the target enters {{tip|resurrection}}.{{bug|2}}
